s.text: Tripp added that she had been "vilified for taking the path of truth," and complained that "many in the entertainment industry have chosen to ridicule me" (presumably referring in part to a Saturday Night Live sketch in which she was portrayed by obese actor John Goodman).
The NYT refrains from characterizing the dress, while the WP valiantly euphemizes, referring to possible matter on the dress as "DNA material," "biological material," and "scientific evidence."
